message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to negotiate a better price, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum selling price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $1000000. This is the best I can do for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $900000. I'll offer $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not at a comfortable price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $950000. I'll offer $980000 for the product.
